content: 1 summer kitchen 2025 short row mitered square dishcloth by the mouse army mitten co knit a mitered square dishcloth in the least-intuitive way this simple project uses kitchen cotton and basic wrap & turn short row to make a square it s a good way to make a dishcloth and this free pdf pattern makes three sizes materials 1 ball or 55 70 80 yds worsted-weight kitchen cotton 1 16-24 circular needle or one pair of straight needles in us7/4 5mm or size needed for gauge tapestry needle for weaving in ends © 2025 the mouse army all rights reserved 2 abbreviations k knit m1l/r make 1 left/right rs/ws right side wrong side sl1 slip one st/s stitch/es w&t wrap and turn wst wrapped st gauge gauge is 14 sts and 32 row over 4 /10cm of lightly blocked garter stitch worked flat please be sure to check your gauge measurements as shown this square dishcloth measures about 8 9 10 /20 23 25 cm on each side © 2025 the mouse army all rights reserved 3 schematic notes although this pattern gives stitch counts for three specific sizes you could knit this over any even number of stitches also because the w&t short row are worked in garter stitch it s not necessary to work the wraps along with their respective stitches you can just knit the stitch itself begin work using crochet cast-on method co 30 34 38 sts row 1 sl1 k to last st w&t row 2 ws k all row 3 sl1 k to one st before next wst w&t row 4 k all repeat row 3 & 4 until all but the first two sts of the rs row have been wrapped row 5 sl1 k1 w&t row 6 k all row 7 rs sl1 k to double wst knit double wst w&t row 8 ws k all repeat row 7 & 8 until all sts knit or wrapped twice end with a ws row on the rs bind off using basic method break yarn weave in ends and wash or block your project is done © 2025 the mouse army all rights reserved
